item.title: Distributed Transaction
item.description: Scenarios Apache ShardingSphere provides transaction semantics in distributed scenarios that can be used when transactional are required. ShardingSphere provides three transaction modes: LOCAL, XA, and BASE to address different scenarios. LOCAL: Suitable for scenarios where data consistency requirements are not high. XA: Provides atomicity guarantees, ensures that data is not lost, and snapshot reads are not guaranteed. Suitable for scenarios where consistency requirements are relatively high and there is no snapshot read requirement.
